cars.description: Talk about a vintage roadster! Hauls everything including old bikes and kids to and from soccer.
Makes you feel like you live in Denver even if you don't. Or helps you go camping with your three buddies.
The little engine that could. Still kicking after being gifted around the extended family four times.
Ever feel like you want to own the biggest, baddest, most polluting personal vehicle? Here you go.
If you're lucky it might make it to the next state. It might not. But for that price it's a steal isn't it?
After Forbes voted it the ugliest car on the market several years running, they finally got the hint.
